item.title: Chinese New Year Motifs in Markers
item.description: A marker illustration divided into 3 distinct panels, each featuring symbols related to Chinese New Year. The panels include vibrant red lanterns, a stylized black snake on bamboo (representing the zodiac), a chrysanthemum (symbolizing longevity). This artwork, created for the Chinese New Year, unfortunately posted much later
